name: drizzle-zod
description: Generate Zod schemas from Drizzle ORM schemas

scripts.build: tsc && resolve-tspaths && cp README.md package.json dist/
scripts.pack: (cd dist && pnpm pack --pack-destination ..) && rm -f package.tgz && mv *.tgz package.tgz
scripts.release: pnpm build && pnpm run pack && pnpm run publish
scripts.release:beta: pnpm build && pnpm run pack && pnpm run publish --tag beta

author: Drizzle Team
